title: mtx.ctl
description: The `mtx.ctl` object provides a graphical user interface for a matrix grid where cells can be toggled on or off. It outputs a list containing the column, row, and status (on/off) of a clicked cell, making it ideal for controlling objects like `mtx~`. Users can dynamically set grid dimensions, cell size, and manage cell states via messages like `set`, `get`, `clear`, `export`, and `import`.
